message.content:
The most likely category for this product would be "Beauty" because it is a self-tanning product and the description mentions its use with Xen Tan lotions, mousse, or mist. 

The second likely category would be "Health & Personal Care" as self-tanning products are often associated with personal care and grooming.

The third likely category would be "Luxury Beauty" as the product is described as a deluxe mitt, indicating a higher-end or luxury product.

The fourth likely category would be "All Beauty" as it encompasses a wide range of beauty products, including self-tanning items.

The fifth likely category would be "Tools & Home Improvement" as the product is a mitt used for applying self-tanning products, which could be considered a tool for improving one's appearance.

prompt:
Title: Xen Tan Deluxe Mitt, 1 Ounce
Content: Silky soft velour mitt makes self tanning products easy to apply. Can be used with Xen Tan lotions, mousse, or mist. Gives smooth professional application. Rinse with cool water and gently squeeze out excess water and allow to dry after each use....
